verses.text: His foundation is in the holy mountains.
Yahweh loves the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
Glorious things are spoken about you, city of God. \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*.
I will record Rahab and Babylon among those who acknowledge me. Behold, Philistia, Tyre, and also Ethiopia: “This one was born there.”
Yes, of Zion it will be said, “This one and that one was born in her;” the Most High himself will establish her.
Yahweh will count, when he writes up the peoples, “This one was born there.” \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*.
Those who sing as well as those who dance say, “All my springs are in you.”
